description: The online commerce giant said its French distribution centres would close until at least 20 April.
title: Coronavirus: Amazon shuts French warehouses after court ruling
title_page: Coronavirus: Amazon shuts French warehouses after court ruling - BBC News
maintext: In the internal document sent to unions on Wednesday, it added: "The company is forced to suspend all production activities in all of its distribution centres in order to assess the inherent risks in the Covid-19 epidemic and take the necessary measures to ensure the safety of its employees."
